http.title: Exeter City Council
http.html:
Skip to content

Stay Connected

Sign up for email updates

Cookies information

exeter.gov.uk uses cookies to make the site simpler. Find out more about the cookies we use.

Close banner

Council Tax 2019/2020

2019/20 Council Tax bills will be sent out from 11/03/2019. During this busy time you may experience longer wait times on our phone lines.

You can make council tax payments online and also sign up to our online services to view your bills, set up a direct debit or inform us about a change or a move.

Popular actions

  1. When is my bin collected?

  2. Report a missed bin

  3. Find a car park

  4. Pay for a service

  5. Sign in to your Council Tax account

Our new Bin Reminder service is now available.
Find out more...

Most requested services

  1. Bins and recycling

    Report a missed bin

    Download your collection calendar

    Renew your garden bin subscription

    Report fly tipping

    More info and actions

  2. Business

    Let us help with your relocation

    Commercial Property Register

    Available council properties

    Business rates explained

    More info and actions

  3. Housing

    Contacting us for housing advice

    What is an empty home?

    Pay your service charges

    Leaseholder information

    More info and actions

  4. Council Tax

    Sign in to your Council Tax account

    Pay your Council Tax

    Tell us about changes

    What is my Council Tax band?

    More info and actions

  5. Planning services

    Find a planning application

    Do I need planning permission?

    Apply for planning permission

    Weekly planning list

    More info and actions

  6. Benefits and welfare

    Make an online benefit claim

    If you move home

    Benefits advice for landlords

    What to do about benefit fraud

    More info and actions

Other services we provide

  1. Car parking

    Find a car park

    Pay by phone

    Pay a car park fine

    Appeal a car park fine

    More info and actions

  2. Clean, safe city

    Report graffiti

    Notify us of an event

    Report fly tipping

    Noise complaints

    More info and actions

  3. Council and democracy

    Our plans for the future

    Find your councillor

    Meetings, agenda and minutes

    Current vacancies

    More info and actions

  4. Leisure and culture

    What's on with Visit Exeter

    Exeter Green Circle Walks

    Our leisure facilities

    Waterways

    More info and actions

  5. Licensing

    Apply for the review of a licence

    Applications in progress

    Dog breeding establishments

    Charity licences

    More info and actions

  6. People and communities

    Council news

    Exeter Citizen

    Bereavements services

    Grants

    More info and actions

We're looking for family-sized properties

Private sector leasing scheme

We still have families looking for a home – do you have a property to lease?

Find out more
